column4: Still does not work, I notice if I turn them up really loud i can hear faint noises
On a right side of upper pane you have a sound icon. Click it first with the left button and make sure it is not set to 0%, then with the right and check if it's not muted.
I told you already what to check first. You might also type "alsamixer" in terminal.
Have you already chceck sound optiond and alsamixer I'd mentiones?
